name: Symphony Solution Inc
tagline: Simplify Your Digital Transformation Through Apps
description:
Symphony Solution Inc. is rated as one of the Top 5 Software, Web and Mobile app development company based out of New Jersey from platforms like Clutch.
Established in 2011, Symphony now serves more than 200 satisfied customers with 300 + Apps live on Playstore, Appstore and Enterprise Stores.
We empower Enterprises and Start-ups in their digital transformation journey. With a  team of 150+ passionate innovators, we have successfully helped businesses from Healthcare, Pharmaceuticals, Hospitality, Retail, FnB, e-Commerce, etc. to enhance their business operations or improve customer engagement with custom applications.
Symphony Solution offers Cloud-Based solutions, Web & Mobile Applications, Data Analytics, Software Consulting, Staff Augmentation & Artificial Intelligence services. We support AWS and AZURE based cloud support, Third Party Payment Integration and provide Custom Analytical Reports for businesses on demand.
Our services are:
 Mobile App Development
Android apps Development
iOS apps Development
Web Development and Web Design
Location Based App Development
E-commerce Solution
Enterprise Mobility
Healthcare IT
